Identity.Name: Grim, The Tinkerer
Identity.Basic_Description: Small hunched human with a drill holding a human arm

Abilities.Name: Tinker
Abilities.Ability: Once per turn as an action, assign one damage to Grim and one damage to an allied unit within 3 range of Grim. If you do, increase the target units health, strength, skill, sprint, sustain, or defense of by 1.

Abilities.Name: Fix
Abilities.Ability: Once per turn as an action, roll a d20. On a roll of 7 or below remove one damage from Grim.
